item.title: XRCC 3.1.3.2 Release
item.content:encoded:
Fixed

  • Fixed an issue where project loading may get stuck due to loading package
  • Fixed an issue where project loading may get stuck due to loading imported asset
  • Fixed an issue where screenshot captor may not work for 360 Images

item.title: XRCC 3.1.3.1 Release
item.content:encoded:
Updated

  • Updated release note hyperlink with respect to documentation update

Fixed

  • Hotfixed an issue where the XRCC installer is not completely installed when upgraded from an older version
  • Fixed an issue where load scene from package with lightmap may lead to null
  • Fixed an issue where Math Compare Behaviour with equal may return wrong result due to precision error
  • Fixed an issue where Behaviour inputfield will go to next line and display empty by removed behaviour multiline feature after press enter
  • Fixed an issue where max is not inclusive for Random Integer Behaviour
  • Fixed an issue where upgrade strategy for Random Integer Behaviour

item.title: XRCC 3.1.3 Release
item.content:encoded:
New

  • Added feature to skip home page and load project directly via command-line arguments (--path <project_path>)
  • Implemented in-application Free Trial Registration Form 

Updated

  • Updated Math Random Number Behaviour to support Integer or Float output
  • Updated EULA Agreement Panel UI for better user experience
  • Improved search keyword history in Instance Panel and Action Panel to persist across panel closures
  • Enhanced Behaviour Panel user experience with improved interactions
  • Updated transform gizmos offset tool to operate in world space
  • Updated Asset Panel with updated model animation preview
  • Updated VotanicXR SDK to version 2020.10.1
  • Updated UI for closing project in XR mode
  • Updated the UX for Instance Selection Panel
  • Updated the behaviour of cross scene instance copy and paste
  • Updated automatic enabling of Interactable when turning on Grabbable for an object in Inspector

Fixed

  • Fixed an issue where user gravity not updating in XR mode
  • Fixed an issue where activating entity not notifying project changes
  • Fixed an issue where default wand length not applying in network mode
  • Fixed an issue where lights with range <= 0.2 not illuminating objects 
  • Fixed an issue where animation resetting not working correctly  
  • Fixed an issue where camera culling layer errors when fader is called multiple times  
  • Fixed an issue where Object Show behaviour not working in Ground Object
  • Fixed an issue where user move behaviour not functioning correctly
  • Fixed an issue where invalid triangle count warning for prefabs from packages without meshes
  • Fixed an issue where animation count not displaying for assets imported from packages
  • Fixed an issue where String Behaviour incompatibility with Number variables causing InvalidCastException
  • Fixed an issue where degraded quality in 360 images viewed through 360-Image sphere in PC mode 
  • Fixed an issue where Asset Panel preview not showing selected image completely
  • Fixed an issue where broken project panel formatting in read-only projects during edit mode
  • Fixed an issue where Behaviour node slider UI not syncing with data on drag or load  
  • Fixed an issue where Chinese characters not displaying in Variable List Panel
  • Fixed an issue where crash when importing broken audio files
  • Fixed an issue where failure to import large numbers of audio assets  
  • Fixed an issue where PC Interaction Scope, Movement Speed, and Rotate Speed applying to XR Edit mode
  • Fixed an issue where imported Sketchfab models causing errors in Asset Panel preview
  • Fixed an issue where files not showing in File Browser during XR Network Project Creation  
  • Fixed an issue where wrong tool applied by default user settings  
  • Fixed an issue where fader not working as expected in XR mode in certain situations
  • Fixed an issue where typos in project loading messages and behaviours
  • Fixed an issue where audio preview time not matching asset duration
  • Fixed an issue where mouse actions conflicting when dragging panels
  • Fixed an issue where transform popup menu dropdowns blocking "Change space" key when closed
  • Fixed an issue where tools not hiding when enabling menu in XR mode  
  • Fixed an issue where project name validation and UI issues in Project Creation Panel
  • Fixed an issue where Video 2D control button not responding correctly  
  • Fixed an issue where Particle System animation unable to resume when paused
  • Fixed an issue where Animation timebar progress bar of inspector only shown 1 second
  • Fixed an issue where error when changing to a deleted scene by Change Scene Behaviour
  • Fixed an issue where saving failure preventing re-save or project quit
  • Fixed an issue where skybox has dotted line for some image format
  • Fixed an issue where animator cannot stop at the last frame by animation option Play one and Stop
  • Fixed an issue where importing character unnecessarily loading Animation/Animator
  • Fixed an issue where remote trigger feature not working as expected
  • Fixed an issue where motion asset is not deletable
  • Fixed an issue where entity can be selected in inspector of button object and option box object
  • Fixed an issue where Auto tool not working as expected
  • Fixed an issue where Remote trigger and its UI not working as expected
  • Fixed an issue where 2D Video Object control button not working as expected
  • Fixed an issue where rename action layer not update UI
  • Fixed an issue where unable to rename assets in asset panel

item.title: XRCC 3.1.2.3 Release
item.content:encoded:
Updated

  • Added data validation to prevent corrupted data impede load scene

Fixed

  • Fixed an issue where XR Support not working as expected in XR mode
  • Fixed an issue where Reporter Panel not display as expected
  • Fixed an issue where Start Contact and Stop Contact Behaviour not working as expected in network mode
  • Hotfixed an issue where unstable to join session in network mode

item.title: XRCC 3.1.2.2 Release
item.content:encoded:
New

  • Added Project CreationPanel ProjectName Validation
  • Added error message and log to Sketchfab download error

Fixed

  • Fixed an issue where hide in play is not working as expected
  • Fixed an issue where character type model assets weren't displaying or animating correctly in preview
  • Fixed an issue where some model imports from Sketchfab were failing
  • Fixed an issue where localization in the variable panel was incorrect
  • Fixed an issue where shortcuts not working as expected in the ReadyPlayerMe Login Panels
  • Fixed an issue where some media object colliders cannot initialized as expected
  • Fixed an issue where option text couldn't be renamed
  • Fixed an issue where ReadyPlayerMe cannot retrieving user model data

item.title: XRCC 3.1.2.1 Release
item.content:encoded:
Updated

  • Updated VotanicXR SDK
  • Updated clear button to some inputfield

Fixed

  • Fixed an issue where fails to duplicate items with contaminated children data
  • Fixed an issue where wrong player name is displayed in network player list panel
  • Fixed an issue where Play Animation action always throw warning notification
  • Fixed an issue where application freeze when changing variable type
  • Fixed an issue where failed to calculate when invalid characters inputted to Inspector

item.title: XRCC 3.1.2 Release
item.content:encoded:
New

  • Added customizable speed for user rotate in XR play & debug mode
  • Added behaviour blocks for user movement speed and rotate speed
  • Added Microbit Panel in XR mode
  • Added Project Level Variable feature with behaviours
  • Added shortcut for open screenshot panel for play mode in PC
  • Added shortcut for switching Main View Panel and behaviour Panel in PC (Shift+W / Shift+E)

Updated

  • Updated motion preview in XR asset panel
  • Updated interaction between user movement to ground object and empty object set to be Wall
  • Updated some behaviour blocks default values (i.e. GetPosition, GetRotation, GetScale)
  • Updated behaviour blocks name (StopStopwatch, StopTimer) to (PauseStopwatch, PauseTimer)
  • Updated anchor points of character from pack
  • Updated loading process to speed up loading
  • Updated behaviour blocks with new categories
  • Updated wording on some confirmation panel
  • Updated some of the behaviour categories' colors
  • Updated model animation play option with inspector setting and behaviour
  • Updated the duration for notification from behaviours with issue

Fixed

  • Fixed an issue where video control button missing hover effect
  • Fixed an issue where button object "Click" event not working
  • Fixed an issue where camera focusing on small item will not be able to see the item
  • Fixed an issue where the previous Action will not be selected when the Select Instance Panel is opened
  • Fixed an issue where the input field cannot be submitted by using the Enter key
  • Fixed an issue where Start Trigger Behaviour not working after the Show Behaviour true of the item
  • Fixed an issue where scene constructed wrongly from play to edit in trial mode
  • Fixed an issue where duplicate scene is not working as expected if instance is parented to entity
  • Fixed an issue where file browser not working as expected when select all files
  • Fixed an issue where item panel unhide all is not working when some item is parented to entity
  • Hotfixed an issue where number variable not store value correctly

item.title: XRCC 3.1.1.1 Release
item.content:encoded:
Fixed

  • Fixed an issue where wrong upgrade is applied from 3.0 to 3.1 upgrade, note that physics properties of item cannot be restored if the project is already upgraded to 3.1.0
  • Fixed an issue where failed to download model from sketchfab
  • Fixed an issue where Random Number Behaviour returns wrong values

item.title: XRCC 3.1.1 Release
item.content:encoded:
Updated

  • Updated asset loading and ui to handle corrupted asset from package

Fixed

  • Fixed an issue where wrong update is applied to Play Sound behaviour
  • Fixed an issue where ambient lighting from package scene not disabled completely

item.title: XRCC 3.1.0.1 Release
item.content:encoded:
Updated

  • Updated localization for some panels
  • Updated font types for Dialog Panel and for font settings
  • Updated 2D and 3D special objects for clarity
  • Updated UX for XR Keyboard
  • Updated UX for XR panel

Fixed

  • Fixed an issue where wrong free trial blocker shown on PC play mode 
  • Fixed an issue where connectivity issue from Microbit 
  • Fixed an issue where skybox lighting and rendering settings not updating when changing scene assets 
  • Fixed an issue where editable text not retrieving the original text value when starting editing

item.title: XRCC 3.1.0 Release
item.content:encoded:
New

  • Improved performance by removed unused resources
  • Added support to connect to and interface with Microbit via BLE
  • Added wit.ai integration for natural language voice input
  • Added new Physics behaviour blocks: Get Velocity
  • Added new Math behaviour blocks:
    • Rounding & Modulo
    • Trigonometric Functions
    • Math Constants
    • Vector3 Operations
    • Power & Log
  • Added String operations behaviour blocks
  • Added font type selection for Text Object
  • Added movement speed to User Component
  • Added localisation support for Traditional Chinese and Simplified Chinese languages
  • Added support to shape key animation for imported model asset
  • Added support to metallic smoothness of material on imported model asset, note that imported model asset may looks different if the model asset was imported on older version
  • Added notification for PC debug mode if behaviour has issue, with setting to enable notification

Updated

  • Updated UX on most UI
  • Updated Sketchfab download model process with improved error handling and error messages
  • Updated notification system for project rename failure
  • Updated behaviour variables panel with re-ordering UI component and UX update
  • Updated UX for using instance popup panel

Fixed

  • Fixed an issue where wand length can set with negative
  • Fixed an issue where XR file browser folder title not updating with path changes
  • Fixed an issue where project search could not handle upper case input names
  • Fixed an issue where project loading failed when switching to behaviour panel during loading
  • Fixed null reference issue in instance panel during loading sequence
  • Fixed an issue where user cannot float in air in XR mode when gravity is disabled
  • Fixed an issue to prevent animations from playing on models with errors
  • Fixed an issue where Math Compare behaviour returning incorrect results with default operator value
  • Fixed an issue where the PC quit dialog panel hiding cursor when canceling
  • Fixed an issue where save as button not working as expected in XR mode
  • Fixed extremely high movement speed in PC mode when user gravity is disabled
  • Fixed an issue where Inspector of Text Object cannot show Chinese characters
  • Fixed an issue where screenshot captor not able to screenshot Text, Button, Image and Video Object in the scene
  • Fixed an issue where Light Object cannot be selected in network edit mode

item.title: XRCC 3.0.2.5 Release
item.content:encoded:
Updated

  • Improved memory usage of image asset
  • Improved performance of physics behaviour
  • Improved the logic and history operation of "hide in edit" operation
  • Improved the user interface of network lobby in PC mode and XR mode
  • Improved the user experience of asset panel with package
  • Improved the user experience of Image 2D Object by update the rendering method between transparent and non-transparent image
  • Updated wand position in PC mode
  • Updated font type of OptionBox object
  • Updated the two-sided property of Image 2D and Video 2D Object with the update of transparency image handling
  • Updated xr file browser to prevent confusion

Fixed

  • Fixed an issue where link and unlink pointing wrong target in different resolution
  • Fixed an issue where online project is added to recent project
  • Fixed an issue where importing in asset selection panel failing
  • Fixed an issue where imported image being resized
  • Fixed an issue where XR home page recent project not sorting as expected
  • Fixed an issue where modify project during saving is not marked as project modified and ignore changes on quit
  • Fixed an issue where wrong item is selected in item panel jump
  • Fixed an issue where delete item may cause error in item panel
  • Fixed an issue where item with 2 level of children not able to parent to entity
  • Fixed an issue where wand not trigger "Stop Pointing" behaviour on disable by Set Tool Behaviour
  • Fixed an issue where spawn buttons of asset panel not working in network mode
  • Fixed an issue where server crash on spawning ground object in network mode
  • Fixed an issue where Call Action not working as expected in network mode
  • Fixed an issue where inspector item tab not releasing authority on unselect
  • Fixed an issue where OptionBox object reset not working for caption and sound
  • Fixed an issue where attempting to auto save caused error in network mode
  • Fixed an issue where "hide in edit/play" not working when joining network session
  • Fixed an issue where locked object blocked selection
  • Fixed an issue where status of collapsed item button not update as expected
  • Fixed an issue where wand not showing as expected in XR network mode
  • Fixed an issue where user transformation behaviours retain effects from play mode to edit mode
  • Fixed an issue where project upgrade from XRCC 2 may failed
  • Fixed an issue where the result is always false if the dropdown of Math Compare Behaviour not modified
  • Fixed an issue where the wand not shown in ring menu after it is hidden by behaviour

item.title: XRCC 3.0.2.4 Release
item.content:encoded:
Updated

  • Updated file browser allowing import of multiple attachments in Reporter Panel
  • Updated item and user to ignore gravity when they are moving through the "Set Position" behaviour
  • Updated Ground Object to diasble collider when "Hide In Play" is enabled

Fixed

  • Fixed an issue where notification show up unexpectedly
  • Fixed an issue where network mode may not be connected after disconnection
  • Fixed an issue where color panel may not work properly
  • Fixed an issue where undo/redo operation not working as expected in model asset
  • Fixed an issue where Waypoint Object not hiding after enable "Hide In Play"
  • Fixed an issue where Play audio override the last playing audio
  • Fixed an issue where children under entity not able to select in get/set variable
  • Fixed an issue where reset not working with correct default value in inspector of entity
  • Fixed an issue where modify item's "Hide In Play" and "Lock" option cannot be saved to project
  • Fixed an issue where default color value of OptionBox Object is wrong
  • Fixed an issue where behaviour flow is stopped if invoking "Call Action" behaviour without calling an action
  • Fixed an issue where Entity cannot invoke Stop Contact Behaviour

item.title: XRCC 3.0.2.3 Release
item.content:encoded:
New

  • Added buttons for link and unlink

Updated

  • Updated UX for scene panel
  • Updated UX for behaviour panel with right click drag to pan the view
  • Updated UX for searching asset panel features
  • Updated UX for save button and save condition
  • Updated to reset the material color to white on change model asset in inspector

Fixed

  • Fixed an issue where entity item's inspector panel is not working as expected
  • Fixed an issue where teleporter tool cannot point to waypoint inside an object
  • Fixed an issue where cursor not reappear when exit play mode by shortcut
  • Fixed an issue where inspector did not close in play mode
  • Fixed an issue where failed to login to Sketchfab when "like" a model in Sketchfab panel without login
  • Fixed an issue where license activation panel not display as expected
  • Fixed an issue where network connection button not working as expected on connected server shut down
  • Fixed an issue where option data of OptionBox Object may not work properly on undo/redo

item.title: XRCC 3.0.2.2 Release
item.content:encoded:
New

  • Added buttons for link and unlink

Updated

  • Updated most of the input field with scroll bar
  • Updated shortcut of special items at left in edit mode
  • Updated support for import wav audio with float wav format
  • Improved UX of scene menu
  • Improved UX of asset panel
  • Improved UX of entity panel
  • Improved UX of network player panel
  • Improved UX of panel panel
  • Improved UX of asset input panel
  • Improved UX of Sketchfab panel
  • Improved UX of action selection and anchor point selection panel
  • Improved UX of behaviour category tab
  • Improved UX of behaviour panel
  • Improved UX of reporter panel
  • Improved UX of pop-up panel when moving the camera or modifying the transform of items

Fixed

  • Fixed an issue where the scene name input field is not clickable in scene menu
  • Fixed an issue where some operations not notify the project modified
  • Fixed an issue where model animation preview did not pause when using the progress bar
  • Fixed an issue where property Hide In Edit and Hide In Play not applying to the children of item
  • Fixed an issue where the user cannot toggle the gizmos space in edit mode
  • Fixed an issue where error caused when setting texture to custom material
  • Fixed an issue where camera position move unexpectedly after right click release in edit mode
  • Fixed an issue where open exist project has no response when saving project
  • Fixed an issue where popup panel settings not saved to setting
  • Fixed an issue where start contact to player is not working as expected
  • Fixed an issue where error caused by linking objects in item menu
  • Fixed an issue where Set Position behaviour not working as expected when enabling relative
  • Fixed an issue where project thumbnail changes not notify the project modified
  • Fixed an issue where issue occurs when inputing non numeric characters to input field
  • Fixed an issue where ReadyPlayerMe unable to import character with invalid link
  • Fixed an issue where ReadyPlayerMe not working as expected when inputting link
  • Fixed an issue where Slideshow auto start not working as expected
  • Fixed an issue where teleporter unable to snap to waypoint inside a scene item
  • Fixed an issue where physics not working as expected for item hidden in play mode
  • Fixed an issue where Look At Behaviour not talking correct result
  • Fixed some typos

item.title: XRCC 3.0.2.1 Release
item.content:encoded:
Updated

  • Updated physics collision on entity's child items
  • Improved UX on Sketchfab panel

Fixed

  • Fixed an issue where teleporter will teleport to wrong position
  • Hotfixed an issue where an entity's child items will disappear when the entity is disabled
  • Fixed an issue where behaviour UI elements are loaded in wrong position under different display resolution
  • Fixed an issue where keyboard control is not working as expected when the scene has gravity in XR mode
  • Fixed an issue where read-only asset causes infinite loading during import and all subsequent project loading operations
  • Fixed an issue where On Click Behaviour is not working as expected in Slideshow 2D Object and Document Object
  • Fixed an issue where behaviour action can be added to items not allowed behaviour (i.e. entity and user)

item.title: XRCC 3.0.2 Release
item.content:encoded:
New

  • Added open file location on project thumbnail in PC homepage
  • Added more information in Project Information Panel
  • Added model animation preview in inspector
  • Added mode selection on open project in XR mode

Updated

  • Updated Reporter Panel to require name and email
  • Improved UX on Reporter Panel to support multi-select to update files
  • Updated project name synchronizing to file name
  • Improved performance on Item Menu
  • Improved performance on update physics collider in Text Object
  • Improved UX on light preview range of Light Object
  • Updated entity position and rotation in play mode to use Edit mode data in PC play mode
  • Improved UX on Action Selection Panel
  • Improved UX on loading package in XR mode
  • Updated keyboard control for move up and down in XR mode
  • Updated implementation for Empty Object with isWall attribute

Bug fixes

  • Fixed an issue where some settings on UI are not stored in setting data
  • Fixed an issue where color picker panel is not working as expected
  • Fixed an issue where undo/redo action are not working as expected after entering play mode
  • Hotfixed an issue where undo/redo action are not working as expected when the operation is dealing with large amount of items
  • Fixed some typos in behaviours block names
  • Fixed an issue where text overlay is not working and overlay on top of images
  • Fixed an issue where items are unable to parent to Light Object
  • Fixed an issue where teleporter tool is not working as expected
  • Fixed an issue where saving is not working in scene panel
  • Fixed an issue where auto-save failed to function
  • Fixed an issue where fine-tuning of input values in popup panel is not working when the value is default value
  • Fixed an issue where model asset not requesting recenter when import model from file and Sketchfab
  • Fixed an issue where Skybox image could not update when pressing the remove button
  • Fixed an issue where change scene asset failed to update the scene thumbnail
  • Fixed an issue where scene thumbnail in inspector is not updated as expected after changing scene asset
  • Fixed an issue where scene name in inspector not updated as expected when using scene from package
  • Fixed an issue where scene thumbnail could not be read from package
  • Fixed an issue where ccdata file can be selected when import asset
  • Fixed an issue where model rotation and scale from package are not assigned as expected
  • Fixed an issue where parenting sometimes not work when trying to link a child item to parent item already have two levels of children item
  • Fixed an issue where calling Fade Behaviour in play mode will affect input and UI when going back to edit mode
  • Fixed an issue where behaviour layer panel not refresh on new layer created by other panel
  • Fixed an issue where Action Start Behaviour can be selected and duplicated in behaviour panel
  • Hotfixed an issue where Set Model behaviour wrongly set color to white
  • Fixed an issue where Play Sound Behaviour failure will stop all subsequent behaviours when no audio asset is assigned
  • Fixed an issue where Start Contact Behaviour is not working with entity
  • Fixed an issue where behaviour variables lost reference when the variable is renamed
  • Fixed an issue where change material color is not working as expected in behaviour
  • Fixed an issue where player tool does not change to wand when opening ring menu in XR mode
  • Fixed an issue where fade is not working as expected in XR mode
  • Fixed an issue where gravity setting is not working as expected in XR mode
  • Fixed an issue where move the player up & down may fall through the ground in XR mode
  • Fixed an issue where asset sometimes cannot be spawned in XR mode
  • Fixed an issue where item display not working as expected after updating Hide In Edit and Hide In Play attribute
  • Fixed an issue where Start Contact Behaviour triggered twice when making contact to user

item.title: XRCC 3.0.1 Release
item.content:encoded:
Updated

  • Improved UX for loading
  • Improved UX for editing with Light Object
  • Improved UX for reporter submission by supporting multiline input
  • Improved performance on loading pack

Bug fixes

  • Fixed various UI issues on icon
  • Fixed various UI issues on project thumbnail icon
  • Fixed various UI issues on tooltip
  • Fixed various UI issues on inspector with Light Object
  • Fixed an issue when "Set Model" behaviour causes loading issue
  • Fixed an issue when "Fade" behaviour not working
  • Fixed an issue when connecting variable behaviour from number to text
  • Fixed an issue when physics does not update as expected if the model mesh is convex
  • Fixed an issue when unit setting not synchronize with setting panel
  • Fixed an issue when unit setting not update to appropriate input fields
  • Fixed an issue when asset select input of model item able to select special object
  • Fixed an issue when preview of entity UI Screen not working
  • Fixed an issue when Hide In Editor not working in some cases
  • Fixed an issue when items falling through scenery
  • Fixed an issue when switching motion between "idle" and default motion
  • Fixed an issue when wrong mode loaded in multiplayer session
  • Fixed an issue where player will hit unknown collider in network debug modes

Internal

  • Fixed unnamed submission to reporter report if no name from input or setting
  • Fixed changed model on runtime lead to material null on back to edit
  • Fixed inspector causing error when selecting light object
  • Diable changing to trigger for mesh collider when concave
  • Fixed physics object does not have physics material

item.title: XRCC 3.0 Release
item.content:encoded:
Application Level

  • In-app licensing
  • Online Text and Video Tutorial
  • Redesigned user interfaces for user experiences

Project Level

  • Favorite feature for project
  • Metadata for project, e.g. project thumbnail, description
  • Export image / 360 image of the scene

PC Edit level

  • Asset
    • Redesigned unified asset management panel
    • Asset tag feature
    • More default assets
    • Allow model to use multiple animations
    • Character and motion upgrade
      • Import custom character models with Mixamo standard
      • Integration to ReadyPlayerMe character platform API
      • Import custom fbx animation with Mixamo standard
  • UI
    • Completely redesigned UI
      • Object PopUp Panel
      • Quick access to Item list
      • Customizable project Unit Display
  • Object
      • Multilevel parenting (up to level 3)
      • Lock item for editing & selection in scene
      • Changed default interactable value of objects based on its type
      • Disable item collider to set as scene environment

PC Play Level

  • Behaviour Update
    • More Behaviours blocks to use for complete control on objects & physics
    • More predictable Transform Behaviour Implementation
      • Deterministic result for mixed transform behaviours
  • Better aligned PC preview and XR play
    • Removed Jump On PC Play mode
